{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinergasse sind zu verkauffen: 
<BIBL>
<TITLE>Prideaun A. und N. Testam</TITLE>, in einer Connex. mit der Völker-Historie, 
<PLACE>Berlin</PLACE> 
<YEAR>1725</YEAR>. 
<VOLUME>4. 1I. Tom. 1. Vol. 2</VOLUME> 
<PRIZE>Cattenburg</PRIZE>
</BIBL> 
<BIBL>
<TITLE>Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas</TITLE>. 
<PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> 
<YEAR>1737</YEAR>. 
<FORMAT>4.</FORMAT>
</BIBL> 
<BIBL>
<TITLE>Bibl.</TITLE> 
<VOLUME>8r. 70.</VOLUME> 
<AUTHOR>Interpp. Reineccii</AUTHOR>, 
<PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> 
<YEAR>1737</YEAR>. 
<FORMAT>8

</FORMAT>
</BIBL> 
<BIBL>
<TITLE>Bibl. Hebr.</TITLE> von 
<AUTHOR>punctata Leusdenii</AUTHOR>, 
<PLACE>Frf.</PLACE> 
<YEAR>1694</YEAR>. 
<FORMAT>12.</FORMAT>
</BIBL> 
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Seldenus</AUTHOR> 
<TITLE>de Diis Syris</TITLE>. 
<PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> 
<YEAR>1692</YEAR>. 
<FORMAT>8.</FORMAT>
</BIBL> 
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Gottschedens</AUTHOR> 
<TITLE>critische Dichtkunst</TITLE>, 
<PLACE>Leipzig</PLACE> 
<YEAR>1737</YEAR>. 
<FORMAT>8v

</FORMAT>
</BIBL> 
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Böddickers</AUTHOR> 
<TITLE>Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach</TITLE>, 
<PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>, 
<YEAR>1729</YEAR>. 
<FORMAT>8v

</FORMAT>
</BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"The original input was a JSON string containing an XML snippet, which needed to be extracted and corrected. The corrections involved: 1. Replacing Unicode/malformed characters (e.g., \u221a\u00fc, \u221a\u2020, \u221a\u2264, \u2202, \u00a7) with their proper German equivalents (e.g., 'sse', '†', 'ss', 'ö', '§'). 2. Correcting the ampersand in 'Vita & Scriptis' to '&'. 3. Standardizing the structure by ensuring all closing tags are present and properly nested, especially for the deeply nested second BIBL entry. 4. Adding line breaks for readability in the final XML output."}
